data.comment: The match has started at BayArena.
Throw-in for Leverkusen at BayArena.
In the minute 1, Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hertha just outside Leverkusen's area.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Leverkusen.
Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hertha.
Hertha drives forward and Dodi Lukebakio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Can Leverkusen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hertha's half?
Daniel Schlager signals a Hertha throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Hertha's Dodi Lukebakio gets in a shot on goal at BayArena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 19, Hertha drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Leverkusen.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Important block from the Hertha defence as Lars Bender fires in a strike for Leverkusen.
Hertha are pushing forward but Omar Alderete's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at BayArena.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Leverkusen surge into the attack at BayArena but Jonathan Tah’s header is off-target.
In the minute 29, Daniel Schlager awards Hertha a goal kick.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 30, Matheus Cunha (Hertha) has received a yellow card from Daniel Schlager.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen pushes forward through Kerem Demirbay, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 33, Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Leverkusen's Leon Bailey is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 35, Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Leverkusen's Lars Bender misses with an attempt on goal.
Hertha have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
In the minute 38, Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
In Leverkusen Leverkusen attack through Florian Wirtz. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Hertha at BayArena.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Free kick Hertha.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 43, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 47, Daniel Schlager signals a Hertha throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
In the minute 51, Kerem Demirbay (Leverkusen) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Leverkusen close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Hertha.
Can Leverkusen capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 55, Leverkusen's Kerem Demirbay gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
Throw-in for Hertha at BayArena.
Daniel Schlager awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
Hertha awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Hertha are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Leverkusen are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 67, Leverkusen are coming forward and Kerem Demirbay gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Daniel Schlager awards Hertha a goal kick.
Throw-in Hertha.
In the minute 70, The away team replace Dodi Lukebakio with Jessic Ngankam.
Hertha make their second substitution with Mathew Leckie replacing Krzysztof Piatek.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at BayArena.
The home team have replaced Aleksandar Dragovic with Tin Jedvaj. This is the first substitution made today by Peter Bosz.
Daniel Schlager signals a Hertha throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
In the minute 75, Bruno Labbadia (Hertha) is making a third substitution, with Marton Dardai replacing Omar Alderete.
Can Hertha get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In the minute 76, Hertha will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Leverkusen.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 79, Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Hertha territory.
Daley Sinkgraven is booked for the home team.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Hertha in the half of Leverkusen.
Throw-in for Leverkusen at BayArena.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 85, Leverkusen needs to be cautious. Hertha have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Leverkusen.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Niklas Stark is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Daniel Schlager signals a Hertha throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hertha’s Niklas Stark is on his feet again at BayArena.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leverkusen.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Hertha.
Leverkusen attack but Lars Bender's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
Daniel Schlager signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Hertha's half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
At BayArena the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Jessic Ngankam of Hertha smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
Leon Bailey for Leverkusen has been booked by Daniel Schlager and receives a first yellow card.
